name: Modules.Cloud.Objects
summary: Provides methods for accessing ArrowDB custom objects.

methods.name: create
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Custom Objects: Create Custom Objects for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the classname property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request. A `classname` property is required.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: query
methods.summary: Retrieve a list of custom objects of type classname.
methods.description:
See Custom Objects: Query Custom Objects for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the classname property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request. A `classname` property is required.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: remove
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Custom Objects: Delete Custom Objects for the request parameters supported by this method.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.summary: Parameters to send in the request. A `classname` property is required.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.

methods.name: show
methods.summary: Retrieve a list of custom objects of type classname.
methods.description:
See Custom Objects: Show Custom Objects(s) for the request parameters supported by this method.

methods.name: update
methods.summary: Update the fields of a custom object of type classname.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Custom Objects: Update Custom Objects for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the classname property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
